def_en: Remote areas are far away from cities and places where most people live, and are therefore difficult to get to.

def_cn: (过去或未来)遥远的，久远的
def_en: The remote past or remote future is a time that is many years distant from the present.

def_cn: 关系不紧密的;关系疏远的;相距甚远的
def_en: If something is remote from a particular subject or area of experience, it is not relevant to it because it is very different.

def_cn: (可能性或机会)渺茫的，微乎其微的
def_en: If you say that there is a remote possibility or chance that something will happen, you are emphasizing that there is only a very small chance that it will happen.

def_cn: 冷漠的;冷淡的;与人疏远的;清高的
def_en: If you describe someone as remote, you mean that they behave as if they do not want to be friendly or closely involved with other people.
